data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Eurhoptus LeConte, 1876 (Curculionidae, Cryptorhynchinae) of America north of Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anderson, Robert S., Caterino, Michael S. (2018): A revision of the genus Eurhoptus LeConte, 1876 (Curculionidae, Cryptorhynchinae) of America north of Mexico. ZooKeys 787: 37-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.787.26948, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.787.26948
